conclusion: Consider factors affecting shadow changes when light source moves right.
Shadows will shift to the left when light source moves to the right.
Size of shadows depends on angle of light source; shadows become longer if light source moves further away horizontally.
Shadow A will move to the left.
Shadow A will likely become longer as the light source moves to the right.
Shadow B will move to the left.
Shadow B will likely become longer as the light source moves to the right.
Shadow C will move to the left.
Shadow C will likely become longer as the light source moves to the right.
Shadow D will move to the left.
Shadow D will likely become longer as the light source moves to the right.
Final answer: Shadows will shift to the left and become longer when light source moves to the right.
